name: Lori Eggink
coverLetter: I have been trimming for 6 years. I have harvested and wet and dry trimmed. I can do basic trim to more detailed trim depending on preferences.  It depends on what kind of bud for weight. (1-2lbs day)  I'm looking for part-time to temporary full time.  I like positive, productive environments.  At this time I have full availability of days.
